title: Topics in Psychology
description: One or more topics not covered in other Honours modules can be periodically offered under this heading, depending upon the interests of students and staff.
prerequisite: Completed 80 MCs of which student must have passed PL1101E, PL2131, PL2132 and 4 out of the 5 core modules (PL3232/PL3102 - PL3236/PL3106), with a minimum CAP of 3.20 or be on the Honours track.
